definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Bynum had 18 points and 13 rebounds for Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 拜纳姆拿下了18分13个篮板。

sentences.english: After United Arab Republic three, gave 12 point 4 backboard report card, displayed not vulgarly .
sentences.chinese: 阿联三节后缴出了12分4篮板的成绩单，表现不俗。

sentences.english: I can rebound and I can score occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 我偶尔能够抢到篮板球或投篮得分。

sentences.english: I think Josh is probably a better perimeter shooter and rebounder than Ronny.
sentences.chinese: 我认为约什在投篮和抢篮板球能力上比罗尼更好些。

sentences.english: He steadied a coin on the top of the basketball bank.
sentences.chinese: 他把一枚硬币稳稳地放在篮板的顶上面。

sentences.english: This time, though, the Lakers will be without their second-leading scorer and rebounder .
sentences.chinese: 可是这次湖人缺少了他们的二号得分手和篮板手。

sentences.english: Combined they had 32 points, 18 rebounds and 13 assists.
sentences.chinese: 替补们一共得到了32分，18个篮板和13次助攻。

sentences.english: Tape the backboard pattern together to make the full pattern.
sentences.chinese: 磁带的篮板模式共同努力，使全模式。

sentences.english: Odom also had 11rebounds for his fifth consecutive double-double.
sentences.chinese: 奥多姆拿下11个篮板，连续第五个两双。

sentences.english: He rebounds and shoots the ball from three.
sentences.chinese: 他也能抢篮板并且抢投三分。

sentences.english: Howard again overpowers the Lakers to pull down 19 rebounds in addition to his 19 points.
sentences.chinese: 霍华德19分19篮板的魔鬼数据再次凌虐了湖人。

sentences.english: Rebounding was his way of atoning for his inaccuracy.
sentences.chinese: 但篮板弥补了他在命中率方面的劣势。

sentences.english: The ball rebounded from the backboard.
Shall a shot for a goal end when the ball touches the backboard?
sentences.chinese: 当球触及篮板是否意味着一次投篮的完成？

definition: to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
